entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
